tool_description: Optimizes HVAC maintenance schedules based on equipment performance data, runtime hours, failure patterns, and manufacturer recommendations to minimize downtime and costs.

equipment_data.description: Equipment identifiers and types for maintenance scheduling

runtime_hours.description: Current runtime hours for each equipment unit

last_maintenance.description: Last maintenance dates in ISO 8601 format

failure_history.description: Number of failures in past 12 months for each equipment

priority_equipment.description: Equipment IDs that require priority scheduling

maintenance_window.description: Preferred maintenance timing: business_hours, after_hours, weekends

error_messages: Array length mismatch: equipment_data, runtime_hours, and last_maintenance must have the same length.
Invalid maintenance dates: All last_maintenance dates must be valid ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Schedule horizon out of range: Value must be between 1 and 24 months.
Invalid maintenance window: Use one of [business_hours, after_hours, weekends].
Negative runtime hours: All runtime_hours values must be non-negative.
Equipment not recognized: One or more equipment identifiers are not found in the system.
usage: Provide equipment_data, runtime_hours, and last_maintenance arrays. Optionally include failure_history, maintenance_budget, priority_equipment, schedule_horizon, and maintenance_window. Returns optimized maintenance schedule and recommendations.

recommended_dates.description: Recommended maintenance dates for each equipment in ISO 8601 format

estimated_costs.description: Estimated maintenance costs for each equipment

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated maintenance cost for the schedule period

schedule_efficiency.description: Schedule efficiency score considering costs and risk mitigation (0-100)
